description:
Samaschool uses informational videos, tutorials and screenshares, practice exams, points and other cool resources, in order to train new and advanced freelancers on oDesk Skills tests.

This course offers you information, best strategies, and practice exercises that will help you improve your test scores on oDesk. Samaschool is a non-profit venture that provides workforce education for the digital economy.

This course was made by Samaschool, a non-profit venture that provides workforce education for the digital economy. Start this course now and witness improvents on your test scores right away. Since its launch in 2013, Samaschool has trained over 330 people in urban and rural communities across the United States. Learn more by visiting our website.

Start this course now and witness improvements on your test scores right away.
title: oDesk: Master Skills Tests
